com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer

Class OARemoteThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer.OARemoteThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OARemoteThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread that is used to process all remote method calls.
    Author:
    vvia

      • setSendMessages

        public void setSendMessages(boolean b)
        Any OAsync changes (OAObject/Hub) that are made within an OARemoteThread will not be broadcast to other computers, since they will also be processing the same originating message. This can be set to true, so that any OASync changes will be sent out. This is useful when an event listener will only run on the server, and any sync changes will then be sent to others. False by default.

      • getSendMessages

        public boolean getSendMessages()

      • setWaitingOnLock
